item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 23, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Phased Array Microphone (2023) (385 points | 140 comments)
2. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (56 points | 14 comments)
3. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (101 points | 25 comments)
4. Casio to Release Ring Watch (24 points | 5 comments)

6. RGFW: Single-header C99 window abstraction library (64 points | 13 comments)
7. Understanding Google's Quantum Error Correction Breakthrough (107 points | 61 comments)
8. Translating My Grandfather's Biograpy (73 points | 23 comments)
9. Amazon to invest another $4B in Anthropic (498 points | 277 comments)
10. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (169 points | 45 comments)
11. Nash equilibria in Ballmer's binary-search interview game (65 points | 13 comments)

14. Rendering "modern" Winamp skins in the browser (67 points | 23 comments)

19. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (454 points | 418 comments)
20. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (224 points | 31 comments)
21. Are at-home genetic tests worth it? As an oncologist, here's my advice. (4 points | 3 comments)
22. Playground Wisdom: Threads Beat Async/Await (59 points | 29 comments)
23. Bayesian Neural Networks (243 points | 52 comments)
24. What's Next for WebGPU (197 points | 179 comments)
25. Prince Nico Mbarga’s biggest hit outsold any of The Beatles’ (2017) (52 points | 46 comments)
26. Wasp (YC W21) is hiring a framework engineer to build Laravel for JavaScript ( | hide)
27. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (232 points | 68 comments)
28. A C++ Mixin System (57 points | 29 comments)
29. What made Dostoevsky's work immortal (122 points | 131 comments)
30. Runtime-Extensible SQL Parsers Using Peg (36 points | discuss)
